Uses of Class
gametools.Group

    • Uses of Group in gametools

      Methods in gametools that return Group 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Group Group.getGroupWithin(Area obj)
      Returns a group of all the sprites that are colliding with the specified object.
      Group Group.getGroupWithin(Area obj, Area.Collision method)
      Returns a group of all the sprites that are colliding with the specified object.
      Methods in gametools with parameters of type Group 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Group.removeAll(Group sprites)
      Removes all the sprites from the group that match the ones passed in.
      Constructors in gametools with parameters of type Group 
      Constructor and Description
      Group(Group copy)
      Creates a copy of the specified group.
